sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
halts
ali kadar nekaj
halts someone
, se neka oseba neha premikati.

seg.quote: He took a step and halted.
He tried to push past, but the girl halted him.

sense.def:
Kadar rast, razvoj ali dejavnost
halts
ali kadar nekdo
halts it
, se popolnoma ustavi.

seg.quote: ...if population growth were to halt overnight.
The firm halted its imports of nylon.
